original: 《 內政 》　　　　　據點需要派任武將擔當各項職務，　　　　　據點的內政才能逐步發展。　　　　　太守著重管理能力，　　　　　幕僚著重務農、經商、技工能力。
text: "Internal Affairs" 　　　　　 bases need to be appointed military generals to assume various duties, "　　　　" the internal affairs of the bases can gradually develop. The prefect of 　　　　　 places emphasis on management ability, while 　　　　　 staff emphasizes on agricultural, business, and technical skills.
